sys_hub_flow.name: Yummie Notification Flow

sys_hub_flow_input.label: Record
sys_hub_flow_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_47a4c61c2f47211031dc5fd92799b6f6

sys_hub_flow_input.label: Table Name
sys_hub_flow_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_47a4c61c2f47211031dc5fd92799b6f6

sys_variable_value.value:
Dear Customer,

Thank you for choosing Yummie! This email is to confirm the receipt of your recent order. We appreciate your business and are excited to fulfill your order.

Please note that this email serves as confirmation that we have received your order and that it is being processed. We will notify you separately once your order has been shipped.

If you have any questions or concerns regarding your order, please feel free to reach out to our customer support team at hello@yummie.legendaryllc.com. We will be happy to assist you.

Thank you again for your purchase. We truly value your business and look forward to serving you again in the future.

Best regards,

sys_variable_value.value:
Dear Customer,

Thank you for choosing Yummie! This email is to confirm the receipt of your recent order. We appreciate your business and are excited to fulfill your order.

Please note that this email serves as confirmation that we have received your order and that it is being processed. We will notify you separately once your order has been shipped.

If you have any questions or concerns regarding your order, please feel free to reach out to our customer support team at hello@yummie.legendaryllc.com. We will be happy to assist you.

Thank you again for your purchase. We truly value your business and look forward to serving you again in the future.

Best regards,
